duties_responsibilities.duty: Leading, motivating, and driving individual and team performance for overall growth and profitability of the branch.
Financial control over all aspects of the business.
Coaching and mentoring teams for professional and financial growth.
Developing and executing sales strategies to expand the business.
Building and leading a team of loan officers with a focus on purchase loans.

education_certification.credential: State license with NMLS, Bachelor's degree in Business (Master's preferred)
